message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $14000. I think it's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $13500. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll be happy with this price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you do any better than that?
